title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8110.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8110.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 23. Route
23, between the Columbia-Greene county line and Massachusetts state line, a
distance of 25.9 miles. (b) Route
9H. The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 9H between Route 23 and the

Harder's Express, Inc. terminal in the Towns of Livingston, Claverack and

Greenport. (c) US Route 9. US Route
9 between Healy Boulevard and Columbia County/Dutchess county line in the City
of Hudson and Towns of Livingston, Clermont, and Greenport. (d) Route 9H. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 9H between Route 9 and Route 66 in the Village of Valatie and
the Towns of Kinderhook, Ghent and Claverack. (e) Route 66. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 66 between Route 9H and Healy Boulevard in the Towns of

Greenport and Claverack. (f) Route
9G and 23B overlap. Route 9G and 23B overlap between Route 23 and the L&B
Products Terminal, a distance of 2.4+- miles in the City of Hudson and Town of

Greenport. (g) Route 23B between

Route 9H/Route 23 and the ADM Milling Co. (RM 3005.5+-) in the Towns of

Claverack and Greenport. (h) Route
22. Route 22 between the Columbia-Dutchess county line and Route 23, a distance
of 12.8+- miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8110.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
